refLanguage.description: ISO 639-1 code of the qualification language
refLanguage.label: Ref language

learningOutcomeDesc.description: Full learning outcome description of the qualification
learningOutcomeDesc.label: Learning outcome description

field.description: Field of Education and Training Code (ISCED FoET 2013)
field.label: Field

creditSystem.description: Name of the Credit system in use (e.g. ECTS)
creditSystem.label: Credit system

creditSysTitle.description: Exact and official title of the Credit system
creditSysTitle.label: Credit system title

creditSysDef.description: Short and abstract description of the Credit system
creditSysDef.label: Credit system description

creditSysValue.description: Value described in terms of hours/certificates/accompl.
creditSysValue.label: Credit system value

creditSysIssuer.description: Which organization/consortium/law regulates who can issue this token
creditSysIssuer.label: Credit system issuer

numCreditPoints.description: Number of credit points assigned to the qualification following this system
numCreditPoints.label: Number of credit points

ectsCreditPoints.description: Number of credit points assigned to the qualification following ECTS system
ectsCreditPoints.label: ECTS credit points

volumeOfLearning.description: How many hours of learning are needed (notional learning hours)
volumeOfLearning.label: Volume of learning

isPartialQual.description: Indicates whether a qualification is a full qualification or a part of another qualification
isPartialQual.label: Is partial qualification

waysToAcquire.description: Whether the qualification can be acquired by validation of a formal/non-formal and/or informal learning processes
waysToAcquire.label: Ways to acquire

eduCredType.description: Full name of the qualification type or credit system in use
eduCredType.label: Education credential type

learningOutcome.description: Expresses a learning outcome of the qualification as a relation to a skill, competence or knowledge from a known framework or standard classification
learningOutcome.label: Learning outcome

relatedOccupation.description: Relates the qualification to an occupation or occupational field from a known framework or standard classification
relatedOccupation.label: Related occupation

recognition.description: Information related to the formal recognition of a qualification
recognition.label: Recognition

awardingActivity.description: Activity related to the awarding of the qualification
awardingActivity.label: Awarding activity

awardingMethod.description: Whether the qualification is certified through undergoing the learning activity or an assessment of acquired competence
awardingMethod.label: Awarding method

gradeScheme.description: Description of the grading scheme and what the grade means
gradeScheme.label: Grade scheme

modeOfStudy.description: Online, face to face, practice, workplace, informal learning
modeOfStudy.label: Mode of study

publicKey.description: Public Key the institution uses to identify itself and authenticate the credentials
publicKey.label: Public key

assesmentMethod.description: Description of the form of assessment
assesmentMethod.label: Assesment method

accreditation.description: Information related to the accreditation, quality assurance and regulation of a qualification
accreditation.label: Accreditation

homePage.description: The homepage (a public web document) of a qualification
homePage.label: Home page

landingPage.description: A web page that can be navigated to in a web browser to gain access to the qualification and/or additional information
landingPage.label: Landing page

supplDoc.description: A public web document containing additional documentation about the qualification, such as a diploma or certificate supplement
supplDoc.label: Supplement Document

historyNote.description: A property to record information about major lifecycle changes of the qualification (e.g. past state/use/meaning of a qualification)
historyNote.label: History note

additionalNote.description: A property to record any further information about a qualification
additionalNote.label: Additional note

status.description: The publication status of a qualification, e.g. released, obsolete, ...
status.label: Status

replacesId.description: A related qualification that was replaced, displaced or superseded by this qualification
replacesId.label: Replaces

replacedById.description: The qualification that replaces, displaces or supersedes this qualification
replacedById.label: Replaced by

owner.description: The organization owning rights over the qualification, e.g. an awarding body, a national or regional authority, etc.
owner.label: Owner

creator.description: Organisation primarily responsible for establishing, defining and managing the qualification and its curricula
creator.label: Creator
